newsitem.title: USA: Tri Polyta ends at 5-1/8 in New York.
newsitem.headline: Tri Polyta ends at 5-1/8 in New York.

text.p: PT Tri Polyta Indonesia closed at 5-1/8 in New York on Friday. It recorded the day's high of 5-1/4 and the day's low 5-1/8.
Its previous close on Thursday was 5-1/4.
Volume on Friday was 5,700 American Depository Shares (ADS). Block volume was nil.
